display_long_description:
**Eternal Starlight** is the ultimate VR real-time strategy game, immersing you in a thrilling space adventure where you must defend your home world from the relentless Kraya armada. Meet (and vaporize) unique alien species, acquire advanced technologies to enhance your fleet while you unlock new ships and loadouts for your next epic battle.

[media]

### **COMMAND YOUR FLEET**

Eternal Starlight features an innovative first-person movement and interaction system, allowing you freeze time and meticulously plan your attack strategy. Effortlessly zoom in and out of 3D space to coordinate your fleet's movements and utilize your special weapons systems to maximum effect. 

### **FEATURES**

* Real-time strategy space combat with tactical depth
* 28 story campaign missions with 3 difficulty levels
* Procedurally generated Endless Mode with customizable rules and modifiers
* Skirmish mode to create your own battles
* Over 100 unique weapons and special ship systems to salvage and equip
* Complex gameplay and deep strategies will keep you coming back
* Voice command support for issuing orders without lifting a finger
* Hand tracking support for controller-free play
* Play standing, seated or in full room-scale VR
